titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation by His Majestie, requiring the aid and assistance of all his subjects on the northside Trent, and within twenty miles southward thereof, for the suppressing of the rebels, now marching against Him.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker printer to the Kings most Excellent Majestie: and by the assignes of John Bill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With engraving of royal arms at head of document.
